plot: Waschgang is a short film about Vic trying to keep his sanity when his love disappears, only leaving a cryptic note. She won't answer her phone and he has no clue where she's gone, so there...
title: Waschgang
plot_es: Waschgang is a short film about Vic trying to keep his sanity when his love disappears, only leaving a cryptic note. She won't answer her phone and he has no clue where she's gone, so there...
